医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
加文研究所和 Illumina 合作改变复杂疾病的治疗方法全球基因组学和人类健康公司 Illumina 与加文医学研究所的 TenK10K 项目合作，从自身免疫性疾病开始，帮助转变复杂疾病的治疗方法，联合投资 2700 万澳元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Garvan-Institute-and-Illumina-collaborate-to-transform-the-treatment-of-complex-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Garvan-Institute-and-Illumina-collaborate-to-transform-the-treatment-of-complex-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f6f7df3-b2c5-4d61-8eba-d6652d893385 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 22:23:16 -0400 Garvan Institute and Illumina collaborate to transform the treatment of complex diseases
研究发现电子烟对眼睛健康造成意想不到的风险《临床医学杂志》上的一项研究表明，接触电子烟蒸汽会导致意外和直接眼部损伤，包括泪膜稳定性的变化和潜在的眼表恶性肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Vaping-poses-unexpected-risks-to-eye-health-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Vaping-poses-unexpected-risks-to-eye-health-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67f16a55-b294-4da0-a816-42aa70a0d29e Tue, 30 Apr 2024 21:43:00 -0400 Vaping poses unexpected risks to eye health, study finds
新型单克隆抗体疫苗可降低儿童患疟疾的风险最近的一项研究表明，基于单克隆抗体的疫苗 L9LS 对于 6 至 10 岁的儿童是安全的，可分别显着降低 70% 和 77% 的疟疾感染风险和临床症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/New-monoclonal-antibody-vaccine-slashes-malaria-risk-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/New-monoclonal-antibody-vaccine-slashes-malaria-risk-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b81d1034-cd93-4610-9cd3-b9b1138fe57c Tue, 30 Apr 2024 21:19:00 -0400 New monoclonal antibody vaccine slashes malaria risk in children
富含蛋白质和抗炎食物的饮食可以预防认知能力下降研究人员评估了富含蛋白质和抗炎饮食对中国老年人认知障碍的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Diets-rich-in- Protein-and-anti-lingual-foods-may-guard-against-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Diets-rich-in- Protein-and-anti-lingual-foods-may-guard-against-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43e5adb8-35b6-4310-a6b4-cf3f84c9a49d Tue, 30 Apr 2024 20:38:00 -0400 Diets rich in protein and anti-inflammatory foods may guard against cognitive decline
肠道细菌与泌尿道感染相关，为治疗提供新角度eClinicalMedicine 上的一项研究探讨了肠道微生物群、尿路定植和复发性尿路感染 (rUTI) 之间的关系，表明尿路致病性大肠杆菌的交叉栖息是 rUTI 复发的重要机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Gut-bacteria-and-urinary-infections-linked-offering-new-angles-for-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Gut-bacteria-and-urinary-infections-linked-offering-new-angles-for-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e07b018a-ea9a-4030-b315-2dcf3af70243 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 20:25:00 -0400 Gut bacteria and urinary infections linked, offering new angles for treatment
研究表明，接触干扰内分泌的化学物质与睡眠质量不佳和维生素 D 缺乏有关《营养》杂志上的研究表明，接触干扰内分泌的化学物质与维生素 D 缺乏和睡眠时间缩短有关，这表明对健康的复合负面影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Study-links-endocrine-disrupting-chemical-exposure-to-poorer-sleep-and-vitamin-D-deficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Study-links-endocrine-disrupting-chemical-exposure-to-poorer-sleep-and-vitamin-D-deficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99dbe6e8-e1a0-41d1-ad82-895f7816a42b Tue, 30 Apr 2024 20:08:00 -0400 Study links endocrine-disrupting chemical exposure to poorer sleep and vitamin D deficiency
ZIP7：治疗与错误折叠蛋白相关的退行性疾病的新靶点蛋白质是生命的主力。生物体将它们用作构建模块、受体、处理器、信使和催化剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/ZIP7-A-novel-target-for-treating-dogenic-diseases-linked-with-misfolded- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/ZIP7-A-novel-target-for-treating-dogenic-diseases-linked-with-misfolded- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fa5b406-4cfc-41ae-8431-ab6ce7eab1e0 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 15:37:22 -0400 ZIP7: A novel target for treating degenerative diseases associated with misfolded proteins
破译 Th2 多能祖细胞在慢性过敏性炎症中的作用目前，大多数过敏性疾病的治疗都需要终身治疗。过敏反应的特征是慢性抗原暴露引起的持续（2 型）炎症，是人类许多慢性疾病的基础，包括哮喘、特应性皮炎、溃疡性结肠炎等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Deciphering-the-role-of-Th2-multipot-progenitor-cells-in-chronic-allergic-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Deciphering-the-role-of-Th2-multipot-progenitor-cells-in-chronic-allergic-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8ba5636-e11a-457c-aad3-28ae6325967b Tue, 30 Apr 2024 15:29:35 -0400 Deciphering the role of Th2-multipotent progenitor cells in chronic allergic inflammation
吸烟者细微 CT 异常的进展可预测急性呼吸道疾病根据今天发表在北美放射学会杂志《放射学》上的一项新研究，如果吸烟者的 CT 扫描出现微小异常，并且随着时间的推移而出现异常，那么他们患急性呼吸道疾病的可能性就更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Progression-of-subtle-CT-abnormalities-in-smokers-predicts-acute-respiratory-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Progression-of-subtle-CT-abnormalities-in-smokers-predicts-acute-respiratory-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84c64724-175f-42d5-88db-5d7d4ad5cd79 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 15:22:24 -0400 Progression of subtle CT abnormalities in smokers predicts acute respiratory disease
花生四烯酸水平较高的遗传倾向与较低的双相情感障碍风险相关根据《生物学》杂志上的一项新研究，含有花生四烯酸（一种存在于鸡蛋、家禽和海鲜中的 omega-6 多不饱和脂肪酸）的脂质循环水平较高的遗传倾向已被发现与较低的双相情感障碍风险相关。精神病学，由爱思唯尔出版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Genetic-propensity-to-higher-arachidonic-acid-levels-linked-to-lower-bipolar-disorder-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Genetic-propensity-to-higher-arachidonic-acid-levels-linked-to-lower-bipolar-disorder-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fda4bd2f-2303-4a9b-94a8-51e9c354a1d5 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 15:15:39 -0400 Genetic propensity to higher arachidonic acid levels linked to lower bipolar disorder risk
